const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "mapping9",
  rules: {
    field: {
      "realm.name": "cloud-saml",
    },
  },
  role_templates: [
    {
      template: {
        source: "saml_user",
      },
    },
    {
      template: {
        source: "_user_{{username}}",
      },
    },
  ],
  enabled: true,
});
console.log(response);
